CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0"> <xsl:output method = "text"/>
<!-- Generate doc title string for DrugInformationSummary documents. --> <xsl:template match = "/DrugInformationSummary"> <xsl:value-of select = "Title"/> <xsl:text>;</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select = "DrugInfoMetaData/DrugInfoType"/> <xsl:text>;</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select = "DrugInfoMetaData/Audience"/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
